description: React component 'OwnerStoreView' for managing store inventory. Includes data fetching, filtering, adding/editing products and categories, and UI rendering with dialogs and tables.

methods.name: loadData
methods.description: Fetches products and categories from the server for the specified branch.

methods.name: handleEditClick
methods.description: Sets the product into edit mode for price updating.

methods.name: handleSavePrice
methods.description: Saves the updated price for a product, updating state accordingly.

methods.name: handleCreateCategory
methods.description: Creates a new category and updates the category list.

methods.name: onAddSubmit
methods.description: Handles submission of the new product form.
